sentence.Network_en: But Chippy Hackee continued to camp out for another week, although it was uncomfortable.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然并不舒服,但东部花鼠奇比还是继续再露营了一个星期.

means.word_mean: 1. small striped semiterrestrial eastern American squirrel with cheek pouches
